Q1.Sol: SELECT DISTINCT City FROM customers WHERE Country='Germany'

Q2.Sol: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY FirstName ASC, LastName DESC

Q3.Sol: SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE BillingCountry='USA' and BillingCity='Boston' ORDER BY Total DESC LIMIT 3

Q4.Sol: SELECT * FROM Invoices WHERE InvoiceDate LIKE '2012%' ORDER BY Total DESC LIMIT 2 OFFSET 2

Q5.Sol:
SELECT * FROM customers 
WHERE company IN ('Google Inc.','Microsoft Corporation','Apple Inc.') 
ORDER BY State,City

Q6.Sol: SELECT DISTINCT BillingCountry FROM invoices WHERE BillingState is NULL ORDER BY BillingCountry

Q7.Sol: SELECT DISTINCT BillingCity FROM invoices WHERE BillingCity NOT LIKE 'A%' OR BillingCity NOT LIKE 'E%' OR BillingCity NOT LIKE 'I%' OR BillingCity NOT LIKE 'O%' OR BillingCity NOT LIKE 'U%' ORDER BY BillingCity

Q1.Sol: SELECT c.FirstName, c.Lastname, i.InvoiceId, i.InvoiceDate, i.BillingCountry FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId WHERE Country = 'Brazil' ORDER BY c.Lastname

Q2.Sol: SELECT t.TrackId, t.Name FROM tracks as t JOIN genres as g USING (GenreId) WHERE g.Name != 'Rock' ORDER BY t.Name

Q3.Sol: SELECT i.InvoiceId, i.InvoiceDate, e.FirstName, e.LastName FROM invoices i JOIN customers c ON  i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId JOIN employees e ON c.CustomerId = e.EmployeeId WHERE e.Title == 'Sales Support Agent' ORDER BY i.InvoiceDate DESC

Q4.Sol: SELECT e.FirstName, e.LastName, e.Title, COUNT(c.CustomerId) AS NumberOfCustomers FROM employees AS e LEFT JOIN customers AS c ON e.EmployeeId = c.SupportRepId GROUP BY e.EmployeeId ORDER BY NumberOfCustomers, e.LastName

Q5.Sol: SELECT e2.FirstName as Employee_Name, e2.Title as Employee_Title, e1.FirstName as Supervisor_Name, e1.Title as Supervisor_Title FROM employees as e1 JOIN employees as e2 ON e1.EmployeeId = e2.ReportsTo ORDER BY Employee_Title

Q6.Sol: SELECT c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, SUM(i.Total) as TotalPaid FROM customers as c JOIN invoices as i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId GROUP BY c.CustomerId ORDER BY TotalPaid DESC LIMIT 1

Q7.Sol: SELECT ar.Name, SUM(inv.UnitPrice*inv.Quantity) as TotalIncome FROM artists as ar JOIN albums as al ON ar.ArtistId = al.ArtistId JOIN tracks as t ON t.AlbumId = al.AlbumId JOIN invoice_items as inv ON t.Trackid = inv.TrackId GROUP BY ar.ArtistId ORDER BY TotalIncome DESC LIMIT 3
